name: Off the Shoulder "Fight the Silence" Tee
description:
Printed on midnight blue lightweight classic T-shirt in silky Viscose. Offered in 1X and 2X to give that oversized, off the shoulder look. Ultra-light oversized T-shirt made with Viscose, a rayon material that has a silky appearance and feel. Estimated Size Chart 1X=XS-M 2x=L-XL 100% Viscose construction 2X is approximately 31 1/8" (79.1cm) in total length Extreme heat not recommended Wash cold; flat to dry For Sizing Information Click Here

name: Feel the Music, Volume 1 (Digital Download)
description: Fight the Silence's first charity compilation album featuring: 1. Closure in Moscow - The Impeccable Beast 2. From Indian Lakes - I Have No Answers 3. Conditions - When It Won't Save You 4. General Fiasco - Ever So Shy 5. Jumping Ships - Heart & Hope 6. The Season Premiere - Anything but Love 7. Valencia - Still Need You Around (Lost Without You) 8. New York Rivals - Where Did We Go Wrong 9. Mitchell Grey - Monster 10. Ryan Cabrera - Rise (The Dog Barks) 11. This Century - To Love and Back Link for download will be sent to customer after purchase. Black Friday Sale: Free with any $50 purchase!
